entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chéticamp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chéticamp 08:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over the Highlands. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning then becoming light this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 10 over the Highlands. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5 except minus 10 over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
